snippet.title: Sayona Mining Ltd (ASX:SYA) Quarterly Activities Report
snippet.content:
Brisbane, Aug 1, 2017 AEST (ABN Newswire) - Sayona Mining Limited (ASX:SYA) (OTCMKTS:DMNXF) ("Sayona" or the "Company") is pleased to announce the activities report for the quarter. Highlights - New Authier JORC-compliant Mineral Resource estimate of 17.4Mt @ 1.02% Li2O (177,212 tonnes Li2O) - Optimisation programs to enhance the Authier value commenced including metallurgical, hydrogeological and geotechnical programs - Successful downstream processing of Authier concentrates and commencement of concept study for production of lithium carbonate - Maiden reverse circulation drilling program completed at Mallina Activities include: - Authier, Canada - An upgrade of the JORC Mineral Resource, the successful demonstration of the conversion of Authier concentrates into beta spodumene, and the commencement of a number of value enhancement programs to improve the base case Pre-Feasibility Study valuation; and - Mallina, Australia - identification of a new group of spoduemen pegmatites in the east of the tenement and completion of a maiden drill programme with 18 RC holes for 1,343 metres.
